snippet: On July 27, the Tour de France race will host La Course by Le Tour de France — a one-day women’s competition staged hours before Tour riders race on the same circuit.
abstract: Tour de France race will host La Course by Le Tour de France, a one-day women’s competition staged hours before Tour riders race on the same circuit; 110-year-old Tour has been almost exclusively a male preserve.
lead_paragraph: On July 27, the Tour de France race will host La Course by Le Tour de France — a one-day women’s competition staged hours before Tour riders race on the same circuit.

headline.main: Women’s Race Added to Tour de France
